title-group.article-title: AN EVALUATION OF THE INTEGRAL OF THE PRODUCT OF THE ERROR FUNCTION AND THE NORMAL PROBABILITY DENSITY WITH APPLICATION TO THE BIVARIATE NORMAL INTEGRAL

abstract.p: This paper derives the value of the integral of the product of the error function and the normal probability density as a series of the Hermite polynomial and the normalized incomplete Gamma function. This expression is beneficial, and can be used for evaluating the bivariate normal integral as a series expansion. This expansion is a good alternative to the well-known tetrachoric series, when the correlation coefficient, ρ, is large in absolute value.
